content:
Craft an item of type: birch_boat
inventory=[{"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 21, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "cartography_table", "quantity": 33, "index": 35}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a birch boat, I need to place 5 birch planks in a U-shape on the crafting grid. The first step is to move a birch plank from slot 13 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now I need to move another birch plank into the crafting grid, this time to the right of the previous one, so I will move it to slot 3.
Ok
